commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ai! Ai, what's your favorite sport?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hm, I love everything! What about you, Rin?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I love all sports, too! Hurdles and soccer are some of my best!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ai and Rin are so chummy now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's so heartwarming, like seeing sisters play together.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh, come on! Next! Let's do the next contest!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: What's the next one?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Giggle* We're going to test another invaluable idol factor. The next contest is a test of musical knowledge!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Knowledge. So it'll be the complete opposite of the race.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: This is Maki's time to shine!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Getting revenge for Rin, huh? Good luck!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Maki, do your best!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Revenge? I guess so. I'll just do my best, because I won't stand to lose.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So they finally brought out Maki.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Maki Nishikino, their song writer. She definitely has a lot of musical knowledge.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I don't know what the test will be like, but if it's about reading music or musical history, I should be able to do well.)

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Just in case you didn't realize, you're not allowed to participate. You're from Nijigasaki, but you're not a school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I know. I'm not going to compete.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ugh! Do you really have to say all that?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But... Who should we have represent us? I only thought of one person when I heard it'd be a test of musical knowledge.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'll do it then.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I studied music quite a bit to become a school idol. This might be a good test of my knowledge.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, let's leave this to you, Setsuna. Is that okay with everyone?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah! Do your best, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Go for it!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So how are we going to do this? Are we seriously going to have a written exam?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I thought of that, but instead, we're doing a "Guess the Song Intro Quiz"!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm going to play the songs on this player at random, and before the words start, you have to guess the song name and the artist.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hold on a second. I thought this was a test of musical knowledge. Wouldn't that be like musical history and music theory?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: No, Maki. Knowing famous artists and songs is wonderful knowledge, too. You can only analyze songs, research them, and make them because people sing them!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You know your stuff, Setsuna. Maki, can we start?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: ...Fine. Even I know some famous songs and artists. Let's do this.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: There will be a total of five songs. Whoever gets three right first, wins. Here's the first one.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I know!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! That's so fast!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That was less like a short song piece and more like a sound.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: D-Do you really know it?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Of course! The artist's name is Mint Chocolate and the song is "Let My Pride of ♡Love♡ Inside."

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's correct!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Chocolate...?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: This trio formed not long after the very idea of school idols came about! They were so popular, mint chocolate chip ice cream even kept selling out.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That's my Kayo-chin! She knows everything.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Wait a second. Are all the songs going to be...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The winner is Setsuna Yuki!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you very much!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I can't believe you got all three answers in less than one second. I like you.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You seem pretty knowledgeable about school idols, too. We should talk some time!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They're getting along? I guess you really do grow closer to the people you compete with.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They weren't competing against each other though.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Why were all the songs school idol songs?!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: M-Maki, don't beat yourself up about it. You had to be a school idol maniac to get some of those, so it's no wonder you didn't know some.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I would have won if it were all classical music.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Don't worry about it! It would have been interesting if you could guess idol songs so fast though.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You should listen to a lot of school idol songs along with all the classical from now on.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes. Songs reflect the times. I think it would help a lot to remember and research recent songs to help with song writing.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Umi, you too? Ugh, I just don't get this!
